Welcome To Saint Louis Jagannath Cultural and Educational Center

Jagannath culture aims at liberating poor and down-trodden for better life for which he is called Patitapaban and for which he observes Ratha Yatra. Humbleness is a cardinal human value which is amply prevalent in culture of Lord Jagannath.

About Us

Saint Louis Jagannath Cultural and Educational Centeris (STLJCEC) a non-profit organization and as such all donations for STLJCEC will be towards construction of new shrine of Jagannath and cultural activities are fully tax-deductible, to the extent allowed by law.!

Saint Louis Jagannath Cultural and Educational Center primarily focuses on promoting and preserving the cultural traditions, religious practices, and spiritual teachings associated with Lord Jagannath, a Hindu deity particularly revered in the Odisha region of India; this often includes activities like teaching about the Jagannath mythology, organizing cultural events like the Rath Yatra festival, and providing educational programs about Odia culture and philosophya ante quis nisl ultrices, nec tempor quam interdum.
